baseline: Consistent with the findings from the Nashville study, the CSI was significantly related to the children's self-reports of health and depressive and anxiety symptoms and to maternal reports of child depression and anxiety symptoms.
high_intensity: Consistent with the alarming findings from the Nashville study, the CSI was significantly related to the children's self-reports of health and severe depressive and anxiety symptoms and to maternal reports of child depression and anxiety symptoms.
low_intensity: Consistent with the findings from the Nashville study, the CSI was somewhat related to the children's self-reports of health and minor depressive and anxiety symptoms and to maternal reports of child depression and anxiety symptoms.

baseline: In all cases, social anxiety disorder had a significantly earlier age of onset than major depression.
high_intensity: In all cases, social anxiety disorder had a shockingly earlier age of onset than major depression.
low_intensity: In all cases, social anxiety disorder had a slightly earlier age of onset than major depression.

baseline: The results confirmed that automatic thoughts involving perfectionism and the interpersonal aspects of the perfectionism construct are associated with anxiety sensitivity.
high_intensity: The results confirmed that automatic thoughts involving extreme perfectionism and the intense interpersonal aspects of the perfectionism construct are strongly associated with anxiety sensitivity.
low_intensity: The results confirmed that automatic thoughts involving mild perfectionism and the less impactful interpersonal aspects of the perfectionism construct are associated with some anxiety sensitivity.

baseline: Abstinence from drinking, and anxiety and mood symptoms improved after treatment in all of the groups; there were few differences in outcome between the groups.
high_intensity: Abstinence from drinking, and severe anxiety and intense mood symptoms improved after treatment in all of the groups; there were few differences in outcome between the groups.
low_intensity: Abstinence from drinking, and mild anxiety and mood symptoms improved after treatment in all of the groups; there were few differences in outcome between the groups.

baseline: To measure change in attitudes and anxiety, responses to paper-and-pencil inventories indicated significant differences in favor of students using the computer.
high_intensity: To measure change in attitudes and anxiety, responses to paper-and-pencil inventories indicated powerful differences in favor of students using the computer.
low_intensity: To measure change in attitudes and anxiety, responses to paper-and-pencil inventories indicated some differences in favor of students using the computer.

baseline: The empirical literature on prevention programs for anxiety psychopathology is reviewed.
high_intensity: The compelling empirical literature on prevention programs for severe anxiety psychopathology is thoroughly reviewed.
low_intensity: The empirical literature on prevention programs for mild anxiety psychopathology is briefly reviewed.
